mapper.update:
UPDATE u_qr_pay_flow
`id`=#{id},
`is_show`=#{isShow},
`gateway_id`=#{gatewayId},
`pay_user_id`=#{payUserId},
`pay_user_type`=#{payUserType},
`pay_account_type`=#{payAccountType},
`rec_user_id`=#{recUserId},
`rec_user_type`=#{recUserType},
`rec_account_type`=#{recAccountType},
`merchant_id`=#{merchantId},
`trans_amount`=#{transAmount},
`pay_amount`=#{payAmount},
`rec_amount`=#{recAmount},
`fee_direction`=#{feeDirection},
`fee`=#{fee},
`platform_fee`=#{platformFee},
`rate`=#{rate},
`batch_id`=#{batchId},
`is_need_clear`=#{isNeedClear},
`clear_state`=#{clearState},
`clear_time`=#{clearTime},
`error_message`=#{errorMessage},
`error_code`=#{errorCode},
`trans_type`=#{transType},
`remark`=#{remark},
`state`=#{state},
`refund_state`=#{refundState},
`refund_amount`=#{refundAmount},
`created_by`=#{createdBy},
`created_date`=#{createdDate},
`modified_by`=#{modifiedBy},
`modified_date`=#{modifiedDate},
`status`=#{status},
`ip`=#{ip},
`access_party_order_no`=#{accessPartyOrderNo},
`access_party_notify_url`=#{accessPartyNotifyUrl},
`access_party_server_fee`=#{accessPartyServerFee},
`acc_plt_fee_clear_state`=#{accPltFeeClearState},
`acc_plt_fee_clear_batch`=#{accPltFeeClearBatch},
`access_party_discount`=#{accessPartyDiscount},
`credit_order_no`=#{creditOrderNo},
`order_source`=#{orderSource},
`base_discount_amount`=#{baseDiscountAmount},
`extra_discount_amount`=#{extraDiscountAmount},
`marking_discount_amount`=#{markingDiscountAmount},
`whole_sales_amount`=#{wholeSalesAmount},
`normal_sale_amount`=#{normalSaleAmount},
`red_envelope_amount`=#{redEnvelopeAmount},
`clear_amount`=#{clearAmount},
`sale_type`=#{saleType},
`trans_no`=#{transNo},
`whole_sales_discount`=#{wholeSalesDiscount},
`card_id`=#{cardId},
`product_id`=#{productId},
`pay_user_ip`=#{payUserIp},
`whole_sales_discount_amount`=#{wholeSalesDiscountAmount},
`base_discount`=#{baseDiscount},
`extra_discount`=#{extraDiscount},
`marking_discount`=#{markingDiscount},
`donation_amount`=#{donationAmount},
`tip_amount`=#{tipAmount},
`marketing_id`=#{marketingId},
`marketing_balance`=#{marketingBalance},
AND status = #{status.value} AND status > 0
AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT flow.id) FROM u_qr_pay_flow flow LEFT JOIN u_user pay_user ON pay_user.id = flow.pay_user_id LEFT JOIN u_merchant merchant ON merchant.user_id = flow.rec_user_id LEFT JOIN u_gateway gateway ON gateway.id = flow.gateway_id WHERE flow.`status` > 0 AND flow.batch_id = #{batchId}

select * from u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.state in ('30','33') AND qf.created_date > unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 DAY))*1000 AND qf.modified_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))*1000 AND status > 0

select * from u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.state ='32' AND qf.created_date > unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 DAY))*1000 AND qf.modified_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))*1000 AND status > 0

select * from u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.trans_type = '2' and qf.state in ('20','23') AND qf.created_date > unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 DAY))*1000 AND qf.modified_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))*1000 AND status > 0 order by qf.created_date desc limit 1000
mapper.update:
UPDATE u_qr_pay_flow
`id`=#{id},
`gateway_id`=#{gatewayId},
`pay_user_id`=#{payUserId},
`pay_user_type`=#{payUserType},
`pay_account_type`=#{payAccountType},
`rec_user_id`=#{recUserId},
`rec_user_type`=#{recUserType},
`rec_account_type`=#{recAccountType},
`merchant_id`=#{merchantId},
`trans_amount`=#{transAmount},
`pay_amount`=#{payAmount},
`rec_amount`=#{recAmount},
`fee_direction`=#{feeDirection},
`fee`=#{fee},
`platform_fee`=#{platformFee},
`is_need_clear`=#{isNeedClear},
`clear_state`=#{clearState},
`clear_time`=#{clearTime},
`error_message`=#{errorMessage},
`error_code`=#{errorCode},
`trans_type`=#{transType},
`remark`=#{remark},
`state`=#{state},
`created_by`=#{createdBy},
`created_date`=#{createdDate},
`modified_by`=#{modifiedBy},
`modified_date`=#{modifiedDate},
`status`=#{status},
`ip`=#{ip},
`access_party_server_fee`=#{accessPartyServerFee},
`access_party_discount`=#{accessPartyDiscount},
`credit_order_no`=#{creditOrderNo},
AND status = #{status.value} AND status > 0
AND id = #{id} AND state != #{state}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(refund_amount) FROM u_refund_flow WHERE flow_id = #{id} AND state = 1

select (SELECT (case when SUM( rec_amount ) is null then 0 else SUM( rec_amount ) end) as amt FROM u_qr_pay_flow WHERE `status` > 0 AND clear_state = 0 AND gateway_id = #{gatewayId} AND rec_user_id =#{userId} AND state = 31) - (select (case when sum(not_settlement_amount) is null then 0 else sum(not_settlement_amount) end) amt from u_refund_flow r where `status` > 0 and state <> 2 and settlement_state in (0,6) and gateway_id = #{gatewayId} and org_rec_user_id = #{userId}) + (select (case when sum(refund_amount) is null then 0 else sum(refund_amount) end) - (case when sum(not_settlement_amount) is null then 0 else sum(not_settlement_amount) end) from u_refund_flow r where `status` > 0 and state = 2 and settlement_state =3 and gateway_id = #{gatewayId} and org_rec_user_id = #{userId}) from dual
mapper.update: update u_qr_pay_flow set clear_state = 0 ,clear_time = null , modified_date = #{time} where batch_id = #{batchId} and rec_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: ( SELECT p.normal_sale_amount AS trans_amount, p.rec_amount AS rec_amount, FROM_UNIXTIME(p.created_date / 1000, #{format}) trans_time FROM u_qr_pay_flow p WHERE p.status = 1 AND p.state IN (1, 31) AND p.sale_type IN (0, 2) AND p.`created_date` between #{start} AND #{ end} AND p.merchant_id = #{merchantId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT w.amount AS trans_amount, w.settlement_amount AS rec_amount, FROM_UNIXTIME(w.created_date / 1000, #{format}) trans_time FROM u_whole_sales_flow w WHERE w.`status` = 1 AND w.state = 1 AND w.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND w.`created_date` between #{start} AND #{ end} )

( SELECT p.trans_amount AS trans_amount, p.rec_amount AS rec_amount, FROM_UNIXTIME(p.clear_time / 1000, #{format}) trans_time FROM u_qr_pay_flow p WHERE p. STATUS > 0 AND p.state IN (1, 31) AND p.clear_state = 1 AND p.sale_type IN (0, 2) AND p.`clear_time` between #{start} AND #{ end} AND p.merchant_id = #{merchantId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT w.amount AS trans_amount, w.settlement_amount AS rec_amount, FROM_UNIXTIME(w.settlement_time / 1000, #{format}) trans_time FROM u_whole_sales_flow w WHERE w.`status` > 0 AND w.state = 1 AND w.settlement_state = 1 AND w.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND w.`settlement_time` between #{start} AND #{ end} )

SELECT q.*, IFNULL(m.`logo_url`,'') as logo_url, ( CASE WHEN q.order_source = 0 THEN IFNULL( m.`practical_name`, '' ) WHEN q.order_source = 1 THEN IFNULL( am.`practical_name`, '' ) ELSE '' END ) AS trading_name FROM u_qr_pay_flow q LEFT JOIN `u_merchant` m ON q.`merchant_id` = m.`id` LEFT JOIN `u_api_merchant` am ON q.`merchant_id` = am.`id` WHERE q.`status` = 1 and (q.`id` = #{id} or q.`credit_order_no` = #{creditNo})

select * from u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.state in (10, 13) AND qf.created_date > unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 8 DAY))*1000 AND qf.modified_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))*1000 AND status > 0
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM u_whole_sales_flow WHERE status > 0 AND state = 1 AND merchant_id = #{merchant_id}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(t1.id)) FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id INNER JOIN u_user t3 ON t3.id = t1.pay_user_id
AND t1.trans_type = 2 AND t1.status = 1
AND t1.trans_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transNo}, '%')
AND t1.state = #{state}
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t3.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND t3.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t3.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0

SELECT DISTINCT(t1.id), t1.state, t1.trans_no, t1.pay_user_id , t2.practical_name, t1.trans_amount, t1.pay_amount, IFNULL(ROUND((t1.base_discount_amount + t1.extra_discount_amount + t1.marking_discount_amount + t1.whole_sales_amount * t1.whole_sales_discount), 2), 0.00) AS discountAmount, t1.red_envelope_amount, t1.platform_fee, t1.rec_amount, t1.created_date, t1.clear_time, t1.sale_type, t1.trans_type, t1.is_need_clear, t3.channel_name, t4.check_state, t4.check_time, t5.user_first_name, t5.user_last_name, t5.phone, t6.error_message FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN u_gateway t3 ON t1.gateway_id = t3.type LEFT JOIN u_withhold_flow t4 ON t1.id = t4.flow_id AND t1.status = t4.status LEFT JOIN u_user t5 on t1.pay_user_id = t5.id left join u_withhold_flow t6 on t6.flow_id=t1.id
AND t1.trans_type = 2 AND t1.status = 1
AND t1.trans_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transNo}, '%')
AND t1.state = #{state}
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t5.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND t5.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t5.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0
ORDER BY t1.created_date DESC
LIMIT ${pc.startIndex}, ${pc.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(t1.id)) FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id INNER JOIN u_user t3 ON t3.id = t1.pay_user_id
AND t1.trans_type = 22 AND t1.status = 1
AND t1.trans_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transNo}, '%')
AND t1.state = #{state}
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t3.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND t3.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t3.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0

SELECT DISTINCT(t1.id), t1.trans_no, t1.pay_user_id, t2.practical_name, t1.trans_amount, t1.pay_amount, IFNULL(ROUND((t1.base_discount_amount + t1.extra_discount_amount + t1.marking_discount_amount + t1.whole_sales_amount * t1.whole_sales_discount), 2), 0.00) AS discountAmount, t1.red_envelope_amount, t1.platform_fee, t1.rec_amount, t1.created_date, t1.clear_time, t1.state, concat (t3.user_first_name,' ',t3.user_last_name) as userName, t3.phone, t1.sale_type, t1.trans_type, t1.is_need_clear, t1.credit_order_no, t6.error_message, t1.refund_amount FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN u_user t3 ON t1.pay_user_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN u_withhold_flow t6 on t6.flow_id=t1.id
AND t1.trans_type = 22 AND t1.status = 1
AND t1.trans_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transNo}, '%')
AND t1.state = #{state}
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t3.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND t3.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t3.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0
ORDER BY t1.created_date DESC
LIMIT ${pc.startIndex}, ${pc.pageSize}

select count(*) from u_clear_flow_detail fd left join u_clear_detail d on fd.clear_batch_id = d.clear_batch_id and fd.rec_user_id = d.user_id left join u_qr_pay_flow qr on qr.id = fd.flow_id left join u_user u on u.id = qr.pay_user_id where d.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT p.rec_amount, p.rec_user_id FROM u_qr_pay_flow p WHERE p. STATUS > 0 AND p.state IN (31, 1) AND p.is_need_clear = 1 AND p.sale_type IN (0, 2) AND p.clear_state = 0 AND p.order_source = 0
AND p.merchant_id IN
#{id}
GROUP BY p.rec_user_id ) pay

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.user_last_name, u.user_first_name FROM ( SELECT max( created_date ) AS created_date, pay_user_id FROM u_qr_pay_flow WHERE `status` = 1 AND state IN ( 1, 31 ) GROUP BY pay_user_id ) f LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = f.pay_user_id WHERE u.user_type = 10 AND u.STATUS = 1 AND u.email != '' AND f.created_date BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.user_last_name, u.user_first_name, u. FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.pay_user_id id FROM u_qr_pay_flow f WHERE f.`status` = 1 and f.state in (1,31) GROUP BY f.pay_user_id ) b ON u.id = b.id WHERE ( floor(( #{timestamp} - u.created_date )/ 86400000 ) + 1 ) = 14 AND u.user_type = 10 AND u.STATUS = 1 AND b.id IS NULL

SELECT * FROM u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.`status` = 1 AND qf.`trans_type` = '22' AND qf.state = '23' AND qf.modified_date < unix_timestamp(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE))*1000 ORDER BY qf.created_date ASC LIMIT 1000
mapper.update:
UPDATE u_qr_pay_flow set
`modified_by`=#{modifiedBy},
`ip`=#{ip},
refund_amount = refund_amount + #{refundAmount},
state = #{state},
`refund_state`=#{refundState},
`modified_date`=#{modifiedDate}
And status > 0
AND `id`=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM u_qr_pay_flow qf WHERE qf.pay_user_id = #{userId} AND qf.`trans_type` = #{transType} AND qf.`status` = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT p.merchant_id FROM u_qr_pay_flow p WHERE p. STATUS > 0 AND p.state IN (31, 104) AND p.is_need_clear = 1 AND p.sale_type IN (0, 2) AND p.clear_state = 0 AND p.order_source = 1 GROUP BY p.merchant_id UNION ALL SELECT ro.merchant_id FROM u_refund_order ro WHERE ro. STATUS = 1 AND ro.state = 1 AND ro.settlement_state = 0 AND order_source = 1 GROUP BY ro.merchant_id ) pay

select q.*,u.phone,m.practical_name as merchantName ,CONCAT(u.user_first_name," ",u.user_last_name) as tradingName , w.card_no,w.card_cc_type as cardCcType ,w.charge as fee,w.order_amount as firstAmount ,q.clear_time = #{settlementDate} FROM u_qr_pay_flow q left join u_api_merchant m on q.merchant_id = m.id left join u_user u on u.id = q.pay_user_id left join u_withhold_flow w on q.id = w.flow_id where q.status = 1 and q.trans_no in (${transNos}) order by q.created_date desc
LIMIT ${pc.startIndex}, ${pc.pageSize}
mapper.update: update u_qr_pay_flow set clear_state = 0 ,clear_time = null , modified_date = #{time} where batch_id = #{batchId} and merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(t1.id)) FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_api_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id INNER JOIN u_user t3 ON t3.id = t1.pay_user_id
AND t1.trans_type = 22 AND t1.status = 1 AND t1.order_source = 1
AND t1.trans_no =#{transNo}
AND t1.state not in (22,2,12,31)
AND t1.state = 31
AND t1.state in (22,2,12)
AND t1.refund_state = 104 AND t1.refund_state = 3
AND t1.refund_state = 104 AND t1.refund_state = 2
AND t1.refund_state = 31 AND t1.refund_state = 1
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t3.phone = #{phone}
AND t3.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t3.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0

SELECT DISTINCT(t1.id), t1.trans_no, t1.pay_user_id, t2.practical_name, t1.trans_amount, t1.pay_amount, IFNULL(ROUND((t1.base_discount_amount + t1.extra_discount_amount + t1.marking_discount_amount + t1.whole_sales_amount * t1.whole_sales_discount), 2), 0.00) AS discountAmount, t1.red_envelope_amount, t1.platform_fee, t1.rec_amount, t1.created_date, t1.clear_time, t1.state, concat (t3.user_first_name,' ',t3.user_last_name) as userName, t3.phone, t1.sale_type, t1.trans_type, t1.is_need_clear, t1.credit_order_no, t6.error_message, t1.refund_amount, t1.refund_state FROM u_qr_pay_flow t1 LEFT JOIN u_api_merchant t2 ON t1.merchant_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN u_user t3 ON t1.pay_user_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN u_withhold_flow t6 on t6.flow_id=t1.id
AND t1.trans_type = 22 AND t1.status = 1 AND t1.order_source = 1
AND t1.trans_no =#{transNo}
AND t1.state not in (22,2,12,31)
AND t1.state = 31
AND t1.state in (22,2,12)
AND t1.refund_state = 104 AND t1.refund_state = 3
AND t1.refund_state = 104 AND t1.refund_state = 2
AND t1.refund_state = 31 AND t1.refund_state = 1
AND t2.practical_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')
AND t1.created_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND t3.phone = #{phone}
AND t3.user_last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userLastName}, '%')
AND t3.user_first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userFirstName}, '%')
AND t1.status = #{status} AND t1.status > 0
ORDER BY t1.created_date DESC
LIMIT ${pc.startIndex}, ${pc.pageSize}
SELECT * FROM u_qr_pay_flow WHERE pay_user_id = #{userId} AND trans_type = #{transType} and `status`=1 ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 0,1
